page.title: 04Farming-Cattle
page.content: Cattle are kept both for{dairy and {beef}and are usually kept outside in the fields in summer time. Their{winter feed}is silage and hay. Beef cattle are sold at markets around the area.Cattle are{milked}by machine twice a day and the milking parlour has to be very clean ,it is an expensive investment for the farmer and some have computers to control feed. All milk is stored in a tank and taken away by road tanker -it is purchased by the{Milk Marketing {Board. Recently many farms have had to cut down on milk production and keep to a{quota. This has made life difficult for some farmers.The quota is controlled by the government through the{E.E.C.
